availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, attorney and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Thompson. Father of Emily E. Thompson, John V. Thompson, Mary E. Thompson, Ruth F. Thompson, and Tarleson D. Thompson. Attorney and farmer in Bullitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District 1, p. 14.
Find A Grave, "William R. Thompson (1810-1894)," Memorial #50845630, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/50845630 (accessed 29 May 2017).
